stimulusHtml: Donuts for Dollars is a typical profit-maximizing firm in a perfectly competitive market that is earning positive economic profit in the short run. Which of the following statements must be true?
choicesHtml: Price must be less than average total cost in the short run, and firms will exit the market in the long run.
Price must be less than average total cost in the short run, and firms will earn normal profit in the long run.
Price must equal average total cost in the short run, and firms will enter the market in the long run.
Price must be greater than average total cost in the short run, and firms will exit the market in the long run.
Price must be greater than average total cost in the short run, and firms will earn normal profit in the long run.
